Invocation Name: a. i. t. v.
des:
The skill content is in English.
This is a compound skill, composed of smart home skill and custom skill, and the features is divided into 2 parts.
Smart Home Skill features: 
turn off the TV, change the channel, and change the input source on Changhong Smart TV. You can say:
"Alexa, turn off the smart tv."
"Alexa, channel up on the smart tv."
"Alexa, change to hdmi one on the smart tv."
Custom Skill features: 
open/start applications on Changhong Smart TV. You can say:
"Alexa, ask a. i. t. v. to open YouTube."
This skill uses the pre-installed "AlexaControl" app on Changhong Smart TV to control Changhong Smart TV via Alexa.
This skill requires an account link, which requires your Amazon account. And skills use OAuth to link accounts.
After enabling this skill, you can enter your Amazon account and password in the Amazon OAuth web page. And, you should enter the same username in the AlexaControl app on the Changhong Smart TV.
When opening the "AlexaControl" application, first click the button to connect to the intermediate station. If this is your first connection and it takes some time to create a secure file, please wait.
Next, you can enter your username (e.g. your Amazon account name) in the input field below and then click the "Subscribe" button to accept the command.
After completing the above operations, you can use Alexa to control the Changhong Smart TV by voice.
